content.name: Night of the Zealot
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: Friday, September 18, 1925. Arkham, Massachusetts. There is something wrong with this town, and not a whole lot this old soothsayer can do to stop the slide...

content.name: The Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
content.author: TheBeard

content.name: Dark Matter
content.author: Axolotl
content.description: It is 2147, and you have just woken up from cryo-sleep in a seemingly abandoned space ship - a deep space adventure across the solar system to prevent the extinction of the human race...

content.name: City of Secrets
content.author: aughhhh
content.description: This contains ten lore-friendly investigators loosely inspired by the gameplay defining mechanics introduced in the Ravnica: City of Guilds expansion for Magic the Gathering.
